This game is fun, but if you take it too seriously, you will get frustrated. It is very difficult to learn, and requires a LOT of practice (I have almost 1000 hours and because that practice has been spread out over 3 years I am still pretty bad). The best way to get better is watch other people (ideally good players) like fl0m at twitch.tv/fl0m or watch the CSGO majors and other pro play. But understand that not everyone wants to play like a pro, that is just to help you get better with smokes, flashes, teamwork, etc... the aim is on you. Playing with a group of 4 other friends always helps because you don't get cheaters on your team, but you can still get cheated against.

O CS é um clássico do mundo dos jogos, dispensa apresentações.

O CS:GO é o último lançamento dessa franquia de sucesso, é claro que o jogo conta com gráficos antigos e física escrota mas, mesmo assim, o jogo é divertido e muito competitivo.

Где ещё ты сможешь найти себе парня, послушать какая хорошая у тебя мама и точно вспомнят твоего отчима по сути из-за которого ты и начал играть в эту богодельню. Только тут ты можешь преодолеть языковой барьер, выучить математику, физику и лишиться девственности, не это ли нам всем нужно?
